name: Asha Foundation
description: Provides educational resources to underprivileged children.

name: Elderly Care Trust
description: Offers medical and emotional support to senior citizens.
impact: Provided free healthcare to over 5,000 elders this year.

name: Future Stars Home
description: A safe and nurturing home for orphaned and abandoned children.
impact: Currently housing 200 children with full care and education.

name: Rural Health Initiative
description: Sets up medical camps and provides primary healthcare in remote villages.
impact: Treated over 50,000 patients in the last two years.

name: Golden Years Retreat
description: A residential facility for elders focusing on community and well-being.
impact: Offers a dignified and happy life for 150 senior residents.

name: Bright Minds Orphanage
description: Focuses on holistic development and skill-building for children.
impact: High rate of graduates pursuing higher education or vocational training.
